Overview

Class methods to extend when including Options.

Back To Top

Instance Methods

#option(name, boolean: false, default: nil) => Symbol

Defines an option for the component.

Parameters

  • name (String, Symbol) — the name of the option.
  • boolean (true, false) — if true, the option is a boolean and will generate a predicate method.
  • default (Proc, Object) — the default value for the option.

Returns

  • (Symbol) — the name of the generated method.

#options => Hash{String => Option}

Returns

  • (Hash{String => Option}) — the defined options for the component.
